name: Riquelme Olarzua
consult: Hello Doc. I'd like to know if I can eat some fry cakes this week with my gf.
answer: Hi Riquelme, eat all that your conscience allows you

name: Rose Walley
consult: Hi!! If I have 4 potatos. If I eat one potato each day that counts like 4 portions?
answer: Hello Rose, Just make the maths.

name: Jackie Chan
consult: Doctor can you please lend me some money to buy olive oil?. I promise to invite you to dinner.
answer: Hi Jackie, I gladdly accept your invitation. See you later, meat!!

name: Doug Addict
consult: Doc, how long takes to cook my legumes? This is kind of annoying
answer: Hello Mr. Addict, you can eat your legumes raw if you have a lot of anxiety.

name: July Anderson
consult: Hello. I just want to know if I can eat more than one cake portion
answer: Don't eat that cake, you chubby girl!!
